demographics.other: Volunteer tutor for high school robotics team

summaries.title: Transition from High School to University-Level Engineering
summaries.summaryText: Luis found the shift from project-based high school learning to theory-heavy coursework challenging but rewarding.

summaries.title: Community and Peer Mentorship as Anchors
summaries.summaryText: Peer mentors and cultural centers helped Luis navigate isolation as a first-gen Latino student.

themes.title: First-Generation Adaptation to STEM Rigor
themes.description: Luis’s story demonstrates resilience through peer and cultural support.

quotes.quoteText: At first I thought I wasn’t smart enough, but then I realized everyone’s struggling; we just don’t talk about it.

areasForImprovement.title: Enhance First-Gen Orientation Programs
areasForImprovement.description: Provide stronger academic transition support for first-generation students entering engineering.
